009package imagingbook.testutils;
010
011import java.util.Random;
012
013public class RandomMatrixGenerator {
014        
015        private final Random rg;
016        
017        public RandomMatrixGenerator(long seed) {
018                this.rg = new Random(seed);
019        }
020        
021        public RandomMatrixGenerator() {
022                this.rg = new Random();
023        }
024        
025        public RandomMatrixGenerator(Random rg) {
026                this.rg = rg;
027        }
028        
029        public double[][] makeRandomMatrix(int rows, int cols, double s) {
030                double[][] A = new double[rows][cols];
031                for (int i = 0; i < rows; i++) {
032                        for (int j = 0; j < cols; j++) {
033                                double x = s * 2 * (rg.nextDouble() - 0.5);
034                                A[i][j] = x;
035                        }
036                }
037                return A;
038        }
039        
040        public double[][] makeRandomMatrix(int rows, int cols) {
041                return makeRandomMatrix(rows, cols, 1.0);
042        }
043        
044        /**
045         * Creates and returns a square matrix of size n x n with
046         * random values in [-s, s].
047         * @param n the matrix size
048         * @param s the value scale
049         * @return a random matrix
050         */
051        public double[][] makeRandomSquareMatrix(int n, double s) {
052                double[][] A = new double[n][n];
053                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
054                        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
055                                double x = s * 2 * (rg.nextDouble() - 0.5);
056                                A[i][j] = x;
057                        }
058                }
059                return A;
060        }
061        
062        /**
063         * Creates and returns a square matrix of size n x n with
064         * random values in [-1, 1].
065         * @param n the matrix size
066         * @return a random matrix
067         */
068        public double[][] makeRandomSquareMatrix(int n) {
069                return makeRandomSquareMatrix(n, 1.0);
070        }
071        
072        /**
073         * Creates and returns a square symmetric matrix of size n x n with
074         * random values in [-s, s].
075         * @param n the matrix size
076         * @param s the value scale
077         * @return a random matrix
078         */
079        public double[][] makeRandomSymmetricMatrix(int n, double s) {
080                double[][] A = new double[n][n];
081                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
082                        for (int j = 0; j <= i; j++) {
083                                double x = s * 2 * (rg.nextDouble() - 0.5);
084                                A[i][j] = x;
085                                if (i != j) {
086                                        A[j][i] = x;
087                                }
088                        }
089                }
090                return A;
091        }
092        
093        /**
094         * Creates and returns a square matrix symmetric of size n x n with
095         * random values in [-1, 1].
096         * @param n the matrix size
097         * @return a random matrix
098         */
099        public double[][] makeRandomSymmetricMatrix(int n) {
100                return makeRandomSymmetricMatrix(n, 1.0);
101        }
102        
103        // --------------------------------------------------------------------
104        
105//      public static void main(String[] args) {
106//              RandomMatrixGenerator rg = new RandomMatrixGenerator(17);
107////            RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(rg.makeRandomSymmetricMatrix(3));
108//              RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(rg.makeRandomMatrix(3 , 5,  1));
109//              System.out.println("M = \n" + Matrix.toString(M));
110//              System.out.println("M symmetric = " + MatrixUtils.isSymmetric(M, 1e-6));
111//              
112//              
113//              
114//              
115//              RealMatrix Z = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
116//                              {{-640324.756071648600000, -13455.063269205853000, -271133.849253710070000, -22199.258754168728000}, 
117//                      {-13455.063269205852000, 565371.765546445600000, -16613.193426604714000, 58.180548072531145}, 
118//                      {-271133.849253710070000, -16613.193426604714000, 74939.976000059920000, 1080.126330774859300}, 
119//                      {-22199.258754168724000, 58.180548072531160, 1080.126330774859000, 13.014525143606523}}
120//              );
121//              
122//              System.out.println("Z symmetric = " + Matrix.isSymmetric(Z, 1e-12));
123//              
124//      }
125
126}
